footertext_hu:
Készítette Diós János. Kapcsolat: janos.dios@allretailconsulting.com.
A forráskód licensze Apache Licensz v2.0.
Az oldal Bootstrap és Bootswatch alapokon készült. Ikonok: Font Awesome. Karakterkészlet: Google.
footertext_en:
Created by Janos Dios. Contact email janos.dios@allretailconsulting.com.
Code licensed under the Apache License v2.0.
Based on Bootstrap and Bootswatch. Icons from Font Awesome. Web fonts from Google.

info.content_en: The purpose of the org.livesense.sample.commons package is to give an anchestor bundle to every liveSense sample to ensure the standardized, nice and clean user interface which easily can be maintained. If this bundle is installed to the JCR repository, any other sample code can use its nodetypes and jsp-pages to render the HTML header, footer. This bundle is using the Bootstrap framework, and built on Bootswatch.

samplesite.content_en:
This node type has the multilingual labels for the current sample site.

SampleName
This property determines which sample the node belongs to
StyleName
Which Bootswatch theme to use (default: spacelab, '.united', '.spruce', etc.).
Brand
Label for the brand in the menu
BacktoTitle
Label for the 'back to' menu item
BacktoTooltip
Tooltip for the 'back to' menu item
Bundleinfo
Label for the 'bundle info' in the header
Backtotop
Label for the 'back to top' button in the footer
Footertext
Footer text

Node type name: [samplecommons: samplesite]

samplepage.content_en:
This node type represents an individual HTML page or a menu item in the sample site. The defined page's menu name is shown in the menu bar.

SampleName
This property determines which sample the node belongs to
Title
The HTML page's title
MenuOrder
Use to determine the sequence of the menu items
MenuName
Label for the menu item
MenuLevel
'1' for the main menu items, '2' for the sub-menu items
MenuLevel2Parent
Node name of the parent menu item for sub-menu items
Jstorun
Run this javascript when menu item selected
MenuLink
Href section for the menu item
Islink
Determines if the menu item is a link or not
Enabled
Hide/show menu item
Isdivider
Use this if the menu item is a divider (only in sub-menus)
HeaderLabel
The page's title in the header
HeaderSubLabel
The page's sub-title in the header
HeaderType
'text': show content in a well-element, 'bundleinfo': bundle info in a well-element
Content
Text to display in the header if the page type is 'text'

Node type name: [samplecommons: samplepage]

subpage.content_en:
Use subpages to make chapters in a specified page. If allowed, subpage's name will shown in the subpage-navigator line, under the header. This bundle only renders the subpage-navigator bar, will not render the subpage itself, that is sample-specific task.

SampleName
This property determines which sample the node belongs to
ParentPage
The subpage belongs to this page
MenuOrder
Determine the order of the subpages
Title
Title of the subpage
Content
Content of the subpage
ContentType
'text' means a standard title/content subpage, or samples can define their own
VisibleInSubnav
Show in the subpage-navigator bar

Node type name: [samplecommons: subpage]

bundleinfo.content_en:
Use this node type to determine the bundle information to display in the header.

SampleName
This property determines which sample the node belongs to
InfoName
Label for the information's name (f.e.: 'Bundle name', 'Version')
InfoValue
Value of the information (f.e.: '1.0.0')
InfoOrder
Use this to determine the order
InfoLink
Href part for the information value

Node type name: [samplecommons: bundleinfo]

usage.content_en:
Simply define the node types of your new sample project using the samplecommons' ones as the type:

[markdownsample:samplesite] > samplecommons:samplesite
[markdownsample:markdownpage] > samplecommons:samplepage
...

Create the necessary sample page, sub-page, etc. nodes:

...
"index": {
	"sampleName": "markdownsample",
	"title": "Markdown Sample",
	"menuOrder": "1",
	"menuName_en": "Home",
	"menuLevel": "1",
	"menuLevel2Parent": "",
	"menuLink": "index.html",
	"jstorun": "",
	"islink": true,
	"enabled": true,
	"isdivider": false,
	"headerLabel_en": "Markdown",
	"headerSubLabel_en": "Nice and Clean",
	"headerType": "bundleinfo",
	"jcr:primaryType": "markdownsample:markdownpage"
},
...

Include the header, sub-header and footer jsp files in your new sample's jsp:

<jsp:directive.include file="/apps/samplecommons/samplepage/header.jsp" />
<jsp:directive.include file="/apps/samplecommons/samplepage/subheader.jsp" />
...
<jsp:directive.include file="/apps/samplecommons/samplepage/footer.jsp" />

And it's done!
